watches.description: The smallest watch in the plugin
watches.access-specific: #small-watch (.s-s-1 to .s-s-12) depending on the value you want edit

specific-specific.description: the other values apart from 3,6,9 and 12

watches.description: The default watch in the plugin
watches.access-specific: #small-watch (.m-s-1 to .m-s-12) depending on the value you want to edit

specific-specific.description: the other values apart from 3,6,9 and 12

watches.description: The largest watch in the plugin
watches.access-specific-inner-value: #large-watch (.l-s-1 to .l-s-12) depending on the value you want to edit

specific-specific.description: the other values apart from 3,6,9 and 12

watches.description: The watch with all values inside the watch unlike outside with the rest

sticks.description: cover all the minor values except at multiples of 5 and 0 goes minute by minute
sticks.access-specific: #x-watch (.m-x), where x is the minute of the stick you want to access

sticks.description: cover all the major values multiples of 5(5,10,15,...) or 0 for 60
sticks.access-specific: #x-watch (.m-x), where x is the minute of the stick you want to access

sticks.description: This is the stick you see behind a number if you are using numbers as your inner symbols

numbers.description: This is the numbers in the watch
